message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  You get the smaller share this time, but I'll be sure to make it fairer next round if you don't accept!
Let's be fair, 60/40 is a good compromise.
Okay, Bob, let's be fair. 50/50 is the only way to go now. I'm not taking another loss on my share!
You're losing value, I'm not. 70/30 is the new fair.
